title: For trade: T206 Cobb red portrait SGC 40
author: brass_rat

posts.post_title: For trade: T206 Cobb red portrait SGC 40
posts.post_content:
Trade only, please.  Email only, no PM.

Looking for cards that I don't have in the following sets:
T211, T213, T214, T215, T216, T217, D303, Voskamp's Pirates.

Will be posting more cards for trade later, but just wanted to start with these couple Cobbs.

(Also have an [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=272272"]S74 Cobb[/URL] and [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=272273"]T213-2 Cobb[/URL] listed in the appropriate sections.)

Thanks,
Steve
